data.comment: The match goes to penalties!
A devastated Maxi Moralez (New York City) misses and walks back to his team mates.
In the minute 0, Tesho Akindele (Orlando) walks up to the ball...
Jesus Medina (New York City) scores from the penalty spot.
Orlando score!
In the minute 0, New York City get ready to take a penalty.
Antonio Carlos (Orlando) converts his penalty!
Ismael Tajouri (New York City) gets ready to take a penalty.
In the minute 0, Junior Urso (Orlando) succeeds from the penalty spot.
New York City miss!
Nani (Orlando) misses his penalty attempt!
In the minute 0, New York City get ready to take a penalty.
Robin Jansson (Orlando) scores!
Gudmundur Thorarinsson (New York City) fails to convert his penalty!
In the minute 0, The penalty shootout is over. The final score is 5-5.
The match has started at Exploria Stadium.
Allen Chapman signals a New York City throw-in in Orlando's half.
In the minute 2, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
Can Orlando get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 3, Orlando have a dangerous throw-in.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Orlando.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Nani.
In the minute 7, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Pedro Gallese.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Maxime Chanot (New York City) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 8, Great play from Jesus Medina to set up the goal.
Pedro Gallese has recovered and rejoins the match in Orlando.
Orlando to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for New York City in the half of Orlando.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to New York City just outside Orlando's area.
Corner awarded to New York City.
In the minute 12, New York City advance rapidly upfield but Allen Chapman blows for offside.
Throw-in New York City.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 14, Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Daryl Dike for Orlando drives towards goal at Exploria Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for New York City in the half of Orlando.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Orlando.
Free kick for New York City in their own half.
In the minute 19, New York City are coming forward and Valentin Castellanos gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Allen Chapman awards Orlando a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
In the minute 20, Allen Chapman signals a throw-in for Orlando, close to New York City's area.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 23, Throw-in high up the field for Orlando in Orlando.
Goal kick for New York City at Exploria Stadium.
Jesus Medina gets his shot on target but fails to score for New York City.
In the minute 26, New York City drives forward and Keaton Parks gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
In Orlando, Orlando push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Orlando are pushing forward but Nani's finish is wide of the goal.
New York City have a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
In the minute 34, Allen Chapman awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for New York City close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to New York City.
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
Allen Chapman signals a New York City throw-in in Orlando's half.
Throw-in for New York City in the half of Orlando.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
Allen Chapman awards the away team a throw-in.
In Orlando New York City drive forward through Valentin Castellanos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 43, Keaton Parks of New York City smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Allen Chapman awards Orlando a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
At Exploria Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Orlando's Chris Mueller breaks free at Exploria Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, New York City have a goal kick.
Free kick New York City.
Corner awarded to New York City.
In the minute 45, Orlando are whistled for offside.
New York City's Maxi Moralez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Allen Chapman blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 47, New York City needs to be cautious. Orlando have an attacking throw-in.
In Orlando Orlando attack through Oriol Rosell. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Orlando.
In the minute 48, Throw-in Orlando.
Throw-in for New York City at Exploria Stadium.
Orlando's Daryl Dike gets in a shot but it is blocked by a New York City defender.
In the minute 51, Throw-in New York City.
Can New York City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orlando's half?
Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 55, Allen Chapman awards the home team a throw-in.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
In the minute 57, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Orlando.
In the minute 59, Orlando to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
Throw-in for New York City at Exploria Stadium.
Orlando have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Valentin Castellanos of New York City gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Orlando.
In the minute 64, New York City pushes forward through Jesus Medina, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to New York City.
New York City's Valentin Castellanos attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
New York City will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Orlando.
In the minute 67, Allen Chapman awards New York City a goal kick.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Valentin Castellanos (New York City) has received a first yellow card.
Antonio Carlos (Orlando) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 72, Nani of Orlando smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
Corner awarded to New York City.
In the minute 74, Can New York City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orlando's half?
Allen Chapman awards the home team a throw-in.
Orlando needs to be cautious. New York City have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 75, Throw-in for New York City in the half of Orlando.
Keaton Parks (New York City) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In the minute 77, Free kick for New York City in the half of Orlando.
Ruan is booked for the home team.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 81, Important block from the Orlando defence as Maxi Moralez fires in a strike for New York City.
Free kick for New York City in their own half.
Tesho Akindele is replacing Daryl Dike for the home team.
In the minute 83, The home team have replaced Oriol Rosell with Andres Perea. This is the second substitution made today by Oscar Pareja.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Maxime Chanot is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 85, New York City’s Maxime Chanot is on his feet again at Exploria Stadium.
Ruan (Orlando) sees red and is sent off in Orlando!
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Orlando close to the penalty box.
Gary Mackay Steven (New York City) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
10 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Maxi Moralez (New York City) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for New York City in their own half.
New York City to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
New York City's Ismael Tajouri misses with an attempt on goal.
Allen Chapman awards Orlando a goal kick.
Ismael Tajouri for New York City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Orlando.
Allen Chapman signals a New York City throw-in in Orlando's half.
Throw-in for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
Goal kick for New York City at Exploria Stadium.
Tesho Akindele of Orlando gets in a strike, but is off target.
The score after normal time is 1-1.
Orlando's Robin Jansson has been booked in Orlando.
Orlando make their third substitution with Kamal Miller replacing Chris Mueller.
Ronny Deila (New York City) is making a first substitution, with Ismael Tajouri replacing Gary Mackay Steven.
Sebastien Ibeagha is replacing Anton Tinnerholm for New York City at Exploria Stadium.
Ronny Deila is making the team's third substitution at Exploria Stadium with Nicolas Acevedo replacing Keaton Parks.
Andres Perea (Orlando) has received a yellow card from Allen Chapman.
The whistle has gone to start the first extra period.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Allen Chapman.
In Orlando New York City attack through Jesus Medina. The finish is off target, however.
Orlando have a goal kick.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to Orlando.
Orlando drive upfield and Nani gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a New York City defender.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
New York City's Valentin Castellanos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Allen Chapman awards Orlando a goal kick.
Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
Oscar Pareja is making the team's fourth substitution at Exploria Stadium with Rodrigo Schlegel replacing Kyle Smith.
Allen Chapman signals a throw-in for New York City, close to Orlando's area.
Can New York City get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
Ismael Tajouri (New York City) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
New York City have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
At Exploria Stadium, Pedro Gallese has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Orlando in Orlando.
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The 1st extra is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The second extra period has started.
Throw-in New York City.
Oscar Pareja (Orlando) is making a fifth substitution, with Benji Michel replacing Mauricio Pereyra.
Orlando's Kamal Miller breaks free at Exploria Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Orlando.
Throw-in for Orlando in their own half.
Attention is being given to Orlando’s Junior Urso and play has been suspended briefly.
Orlando's Junior Urso is back in action after a slight knock.
Corner awarded to New York City.
New York City drives forward and Ronald Matarrita gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
New York City's Nicolas Acevedo misses with an attempt on goal.
Orlando have a goal kick.
The away team replace Alexander Ring with Tony Rocha.
Gudmundur Thorarinsson is on a sub for Ronald Matarrita for New York City.
Throw-in New York City.
Throw-in for New York City at Exploria Stadium.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Alexander Callens for New York City who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd extra.
Allen Chapman signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
Can Orlando capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Goal kick for New York City at Exploria Stadium.
It's 1-1 at the end of extra-time.
Joe Scally (New York City) has replaced the possibly injured Alexander Callens.
Sebastien Ibeagha (New York City) gets a yellow card.
